message: I'm being generous, Bob! Take 10% and we're done.  I'm sure you'll agree this is a fair offer.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! I'm feeling generous today, so I'll offer you 300,000$.  Let's wrap this up quickly.
Bob, you're being stingy! This time, I'm offering you 600,000, but you'd better take it before inflation eats away at your gains even further!
